column1: Communication for Business, Media and Culture MSc
column5: The degree aims at training new professionals in understanding, analysing, planning and implementing actions and complex communication processes for companies specialised in producing and selling both products and services, for communication companies, public and private institutions.More specifically, graduates will develop the necessary knowledge, competences and skills to start off their careers in the communication, marketing and management field. They will be able to create media content in relation to the actual context, design campaigns, plan communication actions, events online and offline.CurriculumFirst
